title: Polynomial and Spline Interpolation
description: In this lab, we will learn how to approximate a function with polynomials up to a certain degree using ridge regression. We will show two different ways of doing this given n_samples of 1d points x_i:

meta.title: Mastering Polynomial and Spline Interpolation
meta.description: Learn how to approximate functions using polynomial and spline interpolation techniques in this comprehensive tutorial.
meta.keywords: ridge regression, machine learning, polynomialfeatures, spline interpolation, polynomial interpolation, machine learning playground, splinetransformer
